import Head from "next/head" import Link from 'next/link' import Router from 'next/router' import NProgress from 'nprogress' import 'nprogress/nprogress.css' import React from 'react'; import { isAuth, logout, user_role} from '../utils/auth'; import { listPage } from '../listPage'; import { listEnum } from '../listEnum'; //Set route event for progress bar Router.onRouteChangeStart = url => NProgress.start() Router.onRouteChangeComplete = url => NProgress.done() Router.onRouteChangeError = url => NProgress.done() const Layout = ({children}) => { const head = () => ( ) const nav = () => (
Home
  • Contact
  • Pricing
  • Download
) return ( {head()} {nav()}
{children}
 ); } export default Layout;
